select too.orderid as orderId,too.begintime as beginTime,too.endtime as endTime,SUM(tod.dishnum*tod.orignalprice) as shouldamount , (select SUM(tsd.payamount)from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('0','1','5','8','17','18','13')) -(select IFNULL( SUM(tom.inflated),0) from t_order_member tom where tom.orderid = too.orderid) as paidinamount,
SUM(tod.dishnum*tod.orignalprice)-( (select SUM(tsd.payamount)from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('0','1','5','8','17','18','13')) -(select IFNULL( SUM(tom.inflated),0) from t_order_member tom where tom.orderid = too.orderid) ) as discountamount, (select SUM(tsd.payamount) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('0')) as cash, (select SUM(tsd.payamount) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('1') and tsd.membercardno in('1')) as card, (select SUM(tsd.payamount) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('1') and tsd.membercardno in('0')) as othercard, (select SUM(tsd.payamount) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('17')) as weixin, (select SUM(tsd.payamount) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('18')) as zhifubao, (select SUM(tsd.payamount) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('5','13')) as credit, (select IFNULL(SUM(tom.netvalue),0.00) from t_order_member tom where too.orderid = tom.orderid) as merbervaluenet, (select IFNULL(SUM(tom.Inflated),0.00) from t_order_member tom where too.orderid = tom.orderid) as mebervalueadd, (select SUM(tsd.payamount) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('11')) as integralconsum, (select IFNULL(SUM(tsd.payamount),0.00) from t_settlement_detail tsd where too.orderid=tsd.orderid and tsd.payway in('12')) as meberTicket from t_order too,t_order_detail tod,t_dish dd where tod.begintime >= #{beginTime} and tod.begintime <= #{endTime} and too.branchid=#{branchId} and too.orderstatus='3' and too.orderid = tod.orderid and tod.dishid = dd.dishid and dd.dishtype not in(2)
and too.shiftid in (0,1)
and too.shiftid=#{type}
GROUP BY tod.orderid order by tod.orderid desc
